trans-unit.source: Represents a file name extension to be associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 表示要与应用程序相关联的文件名称扩展。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the icon to use for files that use a particular <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于使用特定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>的文件的图标

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains the icon.
Gets or sets the description of the file type for use by the shell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置使用的文件类型的说明 shell。

trans-unit.source: A description of the file type.
Gets or sets the file name extension to be associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要与应用程序相关联的文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: The file name extension to be associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 要与应用程序相关联的文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that uniquely identifies the file association's file type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置唯一标识的文件关联的文件类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name that uniquely identifies the file type.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识的文件类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个属性，用于将序列化为文件关联的<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*>XML 文件的属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's DefaultIcon.
trans-unit.target: 此文件关联的 DefaultIcon 的 XML 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个属性，用于将序列化为文件关联的<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>XML 文件的属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*> value.
trans-unit.target: 此文件关联的 XML 表示<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个属性，用于将序列化为文件关联的<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>XML 文件的属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*> value.
trans-unit.target: 此文件关联的 XML 表示<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个属性，用于将序列化为<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>XML 文件的属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*> value.
trans-unit.target: 此文件关联的 XML 表示<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>
